column5: If you are considering a fly in out of Nakina for 2013, I can help with info for the following lakes: HEBNER, MELCHETT, KAP, KAYEDON. I have maps and personal fishing info. PM me or direct e-mail at [email protected].
How was the Hebner trip Dave? Will you be going back?
Trip was very good. Wood DEFINITELY go back. River coming in and exiting both very good. Caught eyes other places also.
Do you know anything about Marshall Lake? Seven Lakes Outfitters has a cabin there.
Do a seach for marshall there are a couple posts
No info on Marshall. Just fly in with AWO. Marshall is not one of their lakes.

#4 Today, 01:28 PM nwont Minnow Join Date: Jul 2012 Location: Nakina, On Posts: 18 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Quote: Originally Posted by Hickdaddy I'm going to Marshall this June. Any advice for me? Don't drive. It's really mostly a big, shallow, sandy bowl. Very easy fishing lake the most inexperienced fisherman will do well there just trolling the reed edges.
I haven't been on Marshall, but I can tell you that Seven Lakes is a great outfitter. Give them a call with your questions and I'm sure you'll get plenty of help.
